title: Preference
context: [ยง171-137] Preference. Preference for a lease of public lands within an industrial park shall be given to an eligible lessee who is a small business. For the purpose of this section, &ldquo;small business&rdquo; means the same as &ldquo;small business concern&rdquo; under section 210-1. [L 1988, c 361, pt of ยง1]
